sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDS(, GROUPNUM, ORDERNUM, DEPTH, PARENT) VALUES(, #groupNum#, #orderNum#, #depth#, #parent#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BOARDS SET SUBJECT = #subject#, CONTENT = #content# WHERE BOARDNUM = #boardNum#
UPDATE BOARDS SET HITCOUNT = HITCOUNT + 1 WHERE BOARDNUM = #boardNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, DATA.* FROM ( SELECT , DEPTH FROM BOARDS WHERE $searchKey$ LIKE '%' || #searchValue# || '%' ORDER BY GROUPNUM DESC, ORDERNUM ASC) DATA) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #start# AND #end#
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM BOARDS WHERE $searchKey$ LIKE '%' || #searchValue# || '%'

SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT BOARDNUM,SUBJECT FROM BOARDS WHERE ($searchKey$ LIKE '%' || #searchValue# || '%') AND
((GROUPNUM=#groupNum# AND ORDERNUM<#orderNum#) OR (GROUPNUM>#groupNum#)) ORDER BY GROUPNUM ASC, ORDERNUM DESC) DATA WHERE ROWNUM=1
